data.comment: The match is underway in London.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In London Fulham drive forward through Denis Odoi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Alexandre Lacazette scores to make it 0-1 at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 9, Arsenal drive upfield and Granit Xhaka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fulham defender.
Arsenal drives forward and Willian gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Fulham's Neeskens Kebano gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Fulham.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Fulham.
Can Fulham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Arsenal's half?
Throw-in for Arsenal at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 19, Fulham to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Chris Kavanagh awards the home team a throw-in.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, In London, Mohamed Elneny of Arsenal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Arsenal are pushing forward but Granit Xhaka's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 22, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Denis Odoi of Fulham is pulled up for offside.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Fulham throw-in in Arsenal's half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Arsenal.
In the minute 26, Michael Hector (Fulham) gets a yellow card.
Arsenal are on the attack at Craven Cottage, where Willian is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Fulham.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Chris Kavanagh blows against Arsenal's Alexandre Lacazette for offside.
In the minute 37, Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang gets in a shot on goal at Craven Cottage. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Arsenal needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, At Craven Cottage, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in Fulham.
Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Fulham to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Arsenal throw-in in Fulham's half.
Can Fulham capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 45, At Craven Cottage the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
The first-half has come to a close in London.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Craven Cottage.
Fulham have a goal kick.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 49, Arsenal move into a more comfortable 0-2 lead. Gabriel Magalhaes is the scorer with a header!
Willian instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 52, In London Fulham's Neeskens Kebano is caught offside.
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Fulham.
Fulham are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 55, Hector Bellerin (Arsenal) has received a yellow card from Chris Kavanagh.
Fulham's Aboubakar Kamara breaks free at Craven Cottage. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Chris Kavanagh awards Arsenal a goal kick.
In the minute 57, It's now 0-3 in London as Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang scores for Arsenal.
Great play from Willian to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Arsenal close to the penalty box.
In the minute 61, Free kick in a good position for Arsenal!
Fulham's Tom Cairney has been booked in London.
Important block from the Fulham defence as Granit Xhaka fires in a strike for Arsenal.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
Aleksandar Mitrovic is on a sub for Aboubakar Kamara for Fulham.
Fulham make their second substitution with Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa replacing Neeskens Kebano.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to Arsenal's area.
Fulham pushes forward through Aleksandar Mitrovic, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Arsenal.
In the minute 70, Arsenal's Alexandre Lacazette is whistled for offside at Craven Cottage.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Fulham.
Alexandre Lacazette for Arsenal drives towards goal at Craven Cottage. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Hector Bellerin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Arsenal.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Arsenal just outside Fulham's area.
Arsenal have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 74, Attention is being given to Arsenalâ€™s Granit Xhaka and play has been suspended briefly.
Scott Parker (Fulham) is making a third substitution, with Bobby Reid replacing Joshua Onomah.
In the minute 76, Granit Xhaka is back on his feet again.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Nicolas Pepe is replacing Willian for the away team.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 78, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Alexandre Lacazette for Arsenal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 78, Fulham have a goal kick.
Free kick for Fulham in the half of Arsenal.
Mikel Arteta (Arsenal) is making a second change, with Dani Ceballos replacing the possibly injured Granit Xhaka.
In the minute 81, Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Craven Cottage.
Free kick Arsenal.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Fulham.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
In the minute 86, The away team replace Alexandre Lacazette with Edward Nketiah.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal in London.
In London Fulham attack through Bobby Reid. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh blows to end the match. The final score is 0-3.
